version_description:
- In addition to the incoming call banner from iOS 14, we now show no other options to answer the call.
- You can see now the call duration directly in the recent list and also with a tap on the time at the Call Details.
- The option in call forwarding should of course be called 'When Busy'.
- Again, we were able to eliminate a few more causes for a crash.

If you like the improvements, feel free to let us know by leaving a positive review. If you are still dissatisfied, please feel free to send us an email with details to mobile-for-ios@swyx.com.

Merry Christmas and stay healthy! Swyx

You have noticed that in some situations the favorites disappear or the order changes. We have fixed this directly and the order will now be the same on all your devices. Local favorites will of course remain local and will not end up on the server or other devices.

If you are now satisfied again, we would appreciate a nice review.
